General.Name: Tashin Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Tashin Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, processes, manufactures, and trades in steel products in Malaysia. The company offers slit coils, steel plates and sheets, steel pipes, flat and square bars, expanded metals, checkered plates, wire mesh, and C purlins for use in the electronics and electrical, industrial stamping, automobiles, furniture, fabrications, and engineering industries. It also manufactures and trades in steel material and general hardware products. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Perai, Malaysia.
